This kind of NTR is better than most. Why? Because it's not portrayed as a heart-wrenching betrayal. The one being NTR'ed (not the MC which the guys are supposed to insert themselves in) says they are into it, literally brings the other person in and still gets sex with her boyfriend in the story, and he is not running off to only fuck Haruka because  "she fucks better" in the end it is obvious that he chooses Sayaka.
 In almost all other NTR stories this is not the case, and you fucking KNOW that I am right on this, so don't be pulling no "double standard" bullshit.

If one were to reverse roles, this is a very different story. Starts with "hey, can you help that friend of mine lose his virginity" and ends up with "oh yeah, I've invited all of my other mates, so get ready to get gangbanged". @SuCCulent because it's not really ntr, she just have a threesome with her friend, they are all participating in the act @The_Orbicular_Lamp_87 you think about netorase, netori is just ntr from the perspective of the one stealing
